name: IgluLabs
tag_list: technology, mobile-apps, handheld, saas, web, mobile-security, cloud
overview:
IgluLabs is a Bangalore, India based firm striving to transform visionary ideas into amazing web and handheld software applications that will shape the role of technology in our lives.

We bring together passionate and experienced minds from embedded software, cloud computing, anti-cyber crime and handheld security research to combine the power of these technologies and build the next generation of products.

Our products provide practical solutions to real world problems, make relevant information easily available and get technology to play an even more vital part in our lives.
